DOC.brief_summary: Estimate effect oral ketoconazole administration ( 400 mg daily 3 day ) pharmacokinetics ( process drug absorb , distribute , metabolize , eliminate body ) single 10 mg dose tasocitinib ( CP-690,550 ) normal healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Of Ketoconazole On The Pharmacokinetics Of Tasocitinib ( CP-690,550 ) In Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female ( nonchildbearing potential ) subject age 18 55 year Clinically significant disease Recent history serious infection
